title: President Donald J. Trump Signs S. 1182 into Law – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Land & Agriculture	

Issued on:
July 31, 2018
On Tuesday, July 31, 2018, the President signed into law:S. 1182, the “National Flood Insurance Program Extension Act of 2018,” which reauthorizes the Federal Emergency Management Agency to enter into new contracts for flood insurance and borrow from the Treasury up to specified amounts through November 30, 2018.
